channel.title: [req] making item and pickup codes available to public
channel.description:
Hello,
i made the item command available however, no other commands would work below it, then i made the pickup command available too, samething any idea on how to get these commands available to the public using nixscape

item.title: [req] making item and pickup codes available to public
item.dc:creator: @MTD MTD
item.description:
@MTD wrote:

I think I see a error in that code.

if (command.startsWith(“pickup”)) {

isn’t closed yet.

Type a } above //Wildy (BETA) and it should work I think.

Read full topic
item.source: [req] making item and pickup codes available to public

item.title: [req] making item and pickup codes available to public
item.dc:creator: @darkest_mage darkest_mage
item.description:
@darkest_mage wrote:

kk

if (command.startsWith("pickup")) {
				try {
					int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11));
					int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12));
					if (/*newItemID <= 6540 && */newItemID >= 0) {
						addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
					} else {
						sendMessage("No such item.");
					}
				} catch(Exception e) {
					sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pickup 0995 10");
				}
//Wildy (BETA)
	if (command.startsWith("wildy")) {
		teleportToX =3212 ; teleportToY = 3960;
		sendMessage("Welcome to The wilderness. You are very deep inside here.");
		addItem(4151,1);
	}
//DIE (BETA)
	if (command.startsWith("die")) {
		removeAllItems();
		teleportToX =3222 ; teleportToY = 3219;
		sendMessage("Oh Dear You Are Dead...");
		}

Read full topic
